title: Mutfak
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lively cafe in the student district by Bogazici University. Staff can speak English and have an idea which options are vegan. Menu has separate olive oil based cold vegetable dishes, vegan suitable breakfast items and hot options. No vegan dessert. Try the soy meatballs plateor the vegan omlette (with chickpea flour and flaxseeds). Reported to be giving all residues on plates to stray animals. Has a board to order meals for someone you know or don't know.
